text: Poliez-le-Grand was a municipality of the district of Gros-de-Vaud in the canton of Vaud in Switzerland. On 1 July 2011, the former municipalities of Dommartin, Naz, Poliez-le-Grand and Sugnens joined together to become the new municipality of Montilliez.Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz published by the Swiss Federal Statistical Office accessed 17 February 2011 == References == == Other websites == * Official website of the municipality of Poliez-le-Grand * Aerial views * Category:2011 disestablishments in Switzerland Category:Former municipalities of Vaud
title: Poliez-le-Grand
